appsDesc.kamel: An integrated app for pilgrims and service providers, managing reception, housing, finance, and departure with real-time dashboards.
appsDesc.cura: A digital app to book doctor appointments and access nearby clinics with emergency support.
appsDesc.monexa: A personal finance app to track balance, income, expenses, and recent transactions with ease.
appsDesc.stoxly: A modern stock app to track portfolios, daily gains, and market insights in real-time.
appsDesc.tictactoe: A modern Tic Tac Toe game with smart AI for fun and challenge.
